summary: Adapt the killmoves to your playstyle.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qmtaB.png[/img][/center]

[b]Adapt the killmoves to [u]your[/u] playstyle ![/b]

You play in first person and you want the maximum immersion out of your game, without the horrible fps -> tps transitions ? 

You play in third person and you simply want the killmoves to do the same ? 

Look no further ! 

With Adaptive Killmoves you will be able to play the way you want : 

Everything is done ingame, if you are playing in first person person, the killmoves will only trigger in first person mode.

And if you\'re playing in third person, the killmoves will only trigger trigger in third person mode.

Also useful if you want to take screenshot of a special killmove in a special mode ;) . 

All this should have been in the game since the release. But here it is. 

Have fun !
author: Drakenof - Dorak
